ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Some thoughts on grouping from another list:
ygData.msgSnippet: In FV fighting the giants I was in this group: Paladin Paladin Paladin Paladin Bard Bard The higher bard sang mana song in down time, and anthem, binding, ? in
ygData.messageBody:
In FV fighting the giants I was in this group:
Paladin
Paladin
Paladin
Paladin
Bard
Bard

The higher bard sang mana song in down time, and anthem, binding, ? in
combat.

I (being 31 at the time) used my mandolin all the time, singing hymm, chords
and psalm...

The xp was great since there was no downtime, as the paladins rotating
pulling while the other 3 healed and meditated. They used stuns to help
control damage if we got a big pull...
